statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths are \displaystyle{a}={4.3} , \displaystyle{b}={6.7}, \displaystyle{c}={7.8}, \displaystyle{d}={8.3}, and \displaystyle{e}={8.7} (all measured in yards).
What is the area of this figure? Round according to the rules for measurements.
